title: End of Mandrake's Story
author: JGray
text:
And now, everyone knows who makes food for the residents and guests of the Inn.

Sentient kitchen appliances, all under the direction of a talking candlestick.

I promise, though, their steaks are always delicious and their coffee is always perfectly brewed.

Next week we begin the final short story of this chapter, Birthday.

Its time for our girls to turn 18.

See you then!

replies.author: Fairportfan*Guest*
replies.text: I think Mandrake was spinning a windy.
